website_summaries.verdict: Weighs in at just over half a pound and easy enough for a beginner.
pros: Noted for its effectiveness cleaning car parts as well as for most shop purposes
Lightweight, making it easy to control and even have a little fun with knowing it won't overpower
cons: The unit does not come with a feeding tube

customer_reviews.title: It is junk and a lie
customer_reviews.text: In the first place the product was advertised as a Jewboer. The item that came was branded "Mingfeng". What is that?? I am open-minded so I thought I would try it. The first time I tried to use it there was nowhere near enough suction to pick up any abrasive. I have another gun that does that just fine. Then the air screw at the grip end of the gun began to leak air. A minor adjustment destroyed the leaky rubber washer. I hope they will take it back. Avoid this one, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Webb Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: This gun is a good value. I have used it about 1 hr. Getting it going was an issue. There were two problems. 1. There was a wasp larva in the sand suction tube 2. The sand suction tube was had a thin layer of metal sealing it off from the main air flow. This should have been removed during manufacturing. Once I figured out what was going on the gun worked fine. The nozzles are solid and for the little bit I used it, it works well Update: I have blasted with this gun for aprox. 10 hrs. It works flawlessly. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First you need to fix it
customer_reviews.text: This would have gotten a five star review if it had been usable as received. I hooked it all up and all it did was blow air; no abrasive. After finding no other issues wrong I remembered a review I had read before purchasing this. The problem is that the tube to which the abrasive hose attaches has a casting blockage. Using a punch I knocked it out, and was in business. This thing now works WAY better than the junker gun that came with my HF blast cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: How to replace parts on this Sand Blaster
customer_reviews.text: I need HELP....This Sand Blast gun will work if you have tons of Air....IT is Thirsty. After a few hours of use the Sand Destroyed the Brass Replaceable part inside the nozzle head. I can NOT seem to find a replacement part for this apparent consumable part. I ordered the Jewboer and Received the MINGFENG as others have described. Not sure what that is all about....Please....If anyone knows how to locate the consumable Brass Part inside the nozzle....I am right in the middle of a big project. Thanks. Picture included
customer_reviews.author: J Wil

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: literally doesn't work in the slightest. I've used tons of different sand/bead blasters, and I've never experienced one that just didn't put out any sand in the slightest. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Harbor Freight cabinet and my gun finally quit drawing media even after replacing the tips. I purchased this at it appeared to be the same. Fitting was a little different size so I just swapped out the one on my old gun with this one and it works great. Nothing fancy but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: car99r

customer_reviews.title: Great gun and good price!
customer_reviews.text: Brought my sandblaster back to life! Was easy to install and works great. Better than the home built gun that was in my cabinet when I bought it! Comes with additional tips, not sure how long each tip will last, but nice to have backups!
customer_reviews.author: 3kidsinaustin

customer_reviews.title: It worked, but now real well
customer_reviews.text: I ended up replacing the gun with one from Eastwood. My disappointment has nothing to do with the seller's performance. They did everything correctly and well. The package was sent fast and was exactly what was described.
customer_reviews.author: W. Story

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap gun
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap gun for a home owner/DIY. I like that it comes with changeable tips. Extra tips can be found at harbor freight. Needs a large air compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Flemon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how much material it will take off
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how much material it will take off. I tried a large siphon hose and then discovered a smaller diameter one works better. It came with the right hose adapter. I wasn't able to adjust it to shut off air flow completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broke almost instantly just like the harbor freight one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was better than the harbor freight one, and used the same tips, nope, junk that broke too.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Found in a short time with 120 grit the valve got stuck open. It did this several times. Other than that it works fine
customer_reviews.author: E. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to do. Looks just like an older one that I had been using for years that finally crapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product would buy again but with the siphon hose
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it did not have the siphon hose but re-ordered from the same company and that will work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had to modify the suction tube to fit my blaster, , but it does the job it was designed fow.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Montague

customer_reviews.title: Could be much better
customer_reviews.text: It does not work very good I use it in my harbor freight blast cabinet second one I have bought for it will not last long enough to use all the nozzles that come with it
customer_reviews.author: oaktrac

customer_reviews.title: sndblaster nozzle
customer_reviews.text: husband uses this almost every day when he is out in his shop, he sandblasts a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: bjstruch

customer_reviews.title: Sandblasting
customer_reviews.text: Super, Fantastic, Perfect and can you tell I'm happy. This one is the best of the best.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: It worked immediately and flawlessly and I highly recommend. I needed it in a rush and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as I was having problems with the gun in our Econo line blast cabinet. It worked immediately and flawlessly and I highly recommend. I needed it in a rush and it was shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R

customer_reviews.title: The ceramic nozzles are different sizes for different force.
customer_reviews.text: It works, it arrived fast, and didn’t cost a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ART WALLACE

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Replace a old HFT gun with this and works great
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Make sure you have a desiccant line dryer. Any moisture that gets in the gun will cause it not to spray. Also this listing did not include the siphon hose so keep that in mind also.
customer_reviews.author: Monty W. Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced an $80 gun. This product has a fantastic price! Quality appears to be high and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Horrocks

customer_reviews.title: It was sent with only the black nozzle, I would like the other three too please...
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the title, it only came with the one black nozzel, and the packaging was clearly ripped open already... The gun doesn't look used, but I paid for the gun and the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Isenhart

customer_reviews.title: Of course more air would always be better, but that's not anything to do with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first sandblast gun I've owned that actually works with my cabinet and compressor. Not sure if it's the gun or the nozzle sizes, but was finally able to accomplish some car parts cleaning that I'd been putting off for ages. Of course more air would always be better, but that's not anything to do with this gun. It seems solidly made, fairly comfortable to manipulate in the cabinet, and all in all is great value. Arrived when it was supposed to. Go ahead, try one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Gun works great however the tips do not last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quick
customer_reviews.text: Brass air tip has hole worn in it after minimal usage, haven't found replacement part so this is now a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew s.

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: Item with supposed to be new. Arrived in open package with used blaster tips. Item was not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for better quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke the second time I used it. Wish I had of installed it sooner as it’s too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: As represented, works fine!
customer_reviews.text: I added a foot air control valve to my glass bead cabinet, so for now the trigger is locked "on". Will retain the trigger function as it will allow me to use this gun for more detailed cleaning. Nice to have several options for nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

product_meta.title: Jewboer Sandblaster Air Siphon Feed Blast Gun Nozzle Ceramic Tips Abrasive Sand Blasting
product_meta.description:
Specifications:
Material: aluminum
Color:silver
Minimum air requirement:6 CFM at 80 PSI
Size:135x150mm
Suitable For:Multi-purpose design for blasting and high pressure liquid or air cleaning of parts and surfaces

Features:
-Can be used for sand glass,sandblasting,surface polishing processing,machinery parts
-such as surface cleaning,rust removal and glass,aluminum alloy and other decorative surface sandblasting,marble engraving

Package includes:
1 x Siphon Feed Blast Gun
2 x iron nozzles:5mm(Silvery) and 6mm(black)
2 x ceramic nozzles:4.5mm and 7mm
feature_bullets: Designed for efficient sandblasting,liquid and air cleaning of parts and surfaces
Can be used for sand glass,sandblasting,surface polishing processing,machinery parts
Minimum air requirement: 6 CFM at 80 PSI
2 iron nozzles:5mm(silvery) and 6mm(black),2 ceramic nozzles:4.5mm and 7mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
